greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Coefficient of p(y) / A056239(n)! in Product_{i >= 1} (1 + x_i), where p is power-sum symmetric functions and y is the integer partition with Heinz number n.
comment: A refinement of Stirling numbers of the first kind.
formula: If n = Product prime(x_i)^y_i is the prime factorization of n, then a(n) = (-1)^(Sum x_i * y_i - Sum y_i) (Sum x_i * y_i)! / (Product x_i^y_i * Product y_i!).
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Sep 13 2018
